doc.after: Somaliland continues to claim the entire area of the former British Somaliland 14 It is currently in control of the western half of the former British Somaliland with northeastern Maakhir having declared itself a separate unrecognised autonomous state within Somalia in July 2007 and the disputed southeastern Sool state had been under the control of neighbouring Puntland A coalition of Gadabuursi intellectuals hailing from the westernmost Awdal province have threatened to secede if Somaliland s independence is recognised 65 66
